snippet: An opulent watch — a source of public embarrassment — disappeared from the wrist of Kirill I, patriarch of the Russian Orthodox Church, in a doctored photo.
abstract: Russian Orthodox Church apologizes after Russian bloggers discover that photographs on the church's Web site of its leader Patriarch Kirill I had been doctored to erase an enormously expensive watch on his wrist; controversy further stokes public anger over the church's often lavish display of wealth and power.
lead_paragraph: An opulent watch — a source of public embarrassment — disappeared from the wrist of Kirill I, patriarch of the Russian Orthodox Church, in a doctored photo.

headline.seo: In Russia, a Watch Vanishes Up Kirill’s Sleeve
headline.main: $30,000 Watch Vanishes Up Church Leader’s Sleeve
headline.print_headline: $30,000 Watch Vanishes Up Church Leader’s Sleeve
